document.full_text: american league most valuable player josh hamilton, sidelined for five weeks with a broken right arm, has been given medical clearance to begin a minor league rehab assignment, the team said on wednesday.
document.title: texas slugger hamilton cleared to begin rehab games
lines_and_colors: american league most valuable player josh hamilton, sidelined for five weeks with a broken right arm, has been given medical clearance to begin a minor league rehab assignment, the team said on wednesday.
